summary: Allows you to craft woodcutter\'s axe, pickaxe, notched pickaxe and lockpick at forge.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][size=\"5\"]Craftable Tools & Lokcpick ![/size][/b][/center]

[b]> Description[/b]

Allows you to create lockpick, woodcutter\'s axe, pickaxe and notched pickaxe at forge.
It\'s in the Misc section.

---== RECIPES ==--- 
[list]
[*][b]WoodAxe[/b] - 1 iron ingot / 1 firewood
[*][b]PickAxe[/b] - 2 iron ingot / 1 firewood
[*][b]Notched PickAxe[/b] - 2 iron ingot / 1 firewood / 1 Greater Soul Gem (filled)
[*][b]Lockpick[/b] (x3) - 1 iron ingot
[/list]

===========================================================
v1.2
All the tools are now in the Misc section.
Rajout d\'une version avec les textes en français et correction de la traduction pour la \"Pioche Crantée\" (qui s\'appelle \"Hache Enchantée\" par défaut... pour une pioche...).
Added : Screenshot with english text.

Quick update : The woodcutter\'s axe has his name correctly now, please re-download the mod.
Sorry for the inconvenience.

===========================================================
v1.1 
Added : The Notched PickAxe (Smithing Expertise 5 pts + Shock damage 5pts).
Updating : Reduced materials required for the tools.

20 nov 2011 - Added : Version 1 iron ingot = 5 or 10 lockpick
21 nov 2011 - Added : Tools version only

===========================================================
v1.0
Initial Release

===========================================================

[b]> Installation[/b]

Put the *.esp file in your Data folder, don\'t forget to enable it.


[b]> Uninstallation[/b]

Delete the *.esp file.

===========================================================

[b]> My other mod[/b]

[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1391]Craftable Forsworn weapons[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1555]Iron & Steel Arrows Leopard[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2082]Firewood, Ore & Ingot weight reduction[/url]

===========================================================

Enjoy !


~Leezi
author: Leezi
